attributes.action: lobby the Official Chart Company regarding the unfair trading advantage being exploited by Simco Ltd with the release of the X-Factor Christmas single.
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: The undersigned demand that the X-Factor Christmas single be excluded from the chart due to its adverse influence on national culture and identity. It is now well established that the Christmas number one in the UK will be the X-Factor single. The Christmas number one has massive cultural importance that is far too great to allow a single company to have complete ownership as a publicity tool.

reasons: Outside the remit of the Prime Minister and Government
